eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Idaho; AT 08:03 PM ON SEP 19, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 10:03 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is an activation of the Endangered Missing Person Alert system.  The Idaho State Police is looking for a missing person Norman Murphy Baker who has early onset dementia and is believed to be in danger. He is a 79 year old male that is bald has blue eyes is 5'9" 260 lbs. Authorities say that the missing person may be traveling in a 10ft U-Haul GMC van with Arizona plates A H 7 1 2 0 8 that was last seen heading southbound on HWY 45 from Nampa Idaho. If you have any information on the where abouts of this missing person please contact 9  1  1 immediately.
